title: Bug 17289 - Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: Try clicking on the first Combo.
OB: When clicking on the first Combo, it doesn't take focus. It only takes focus when the combo list is dropped down.
EB: The focus caret should be in the first Combo "Host:" after clicking on it.
SR:
1. Open the application
2. Locate the first Combo labeled "Host:"
3. Click on the Combo
4. Verify that the focus caret is in the Combo
